interface.name: usermanage_domtrans_chfn
interface.summary: Execute chfn in the chfn domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: usermanage_run_chfn
interface.summary: Execute chfn in the chfn domain, and allow the specified role the chfn domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the chfn domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the chfn domain to use.

interface.name: usermanage_domtrans_groupadd
interface.summary: Execute groupadd in the groupadd domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: usermanage_run_groupadd
interface.summary: Execute groupadd in the groupadd domain, and allow the specified role the groupadd domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the groupadd domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the groupadd domain to use.

param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the passwd domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the passwd domain to use.

interface.name: usermanage_domtrans_admin_passwd
interface.summary: Execute password admin functions in the admin passwd domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

interface.name: usermanage_run_admin_passwd
interface.summary: Execute passwd admin functions in the admin passwd domain, and allow the specified role the admin passwd domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the admin passwd domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the admin passwd domain to use.
